title: Leader board not showing updated score?

content.raw:
Looking at the logs from run ID `f6a3e4ea-c9ae-4dd9-a2d0-62ece9aef724` for Map Quickly, it looks like I should have a point.  Specifically in `subt_urban_2020-01-03T07:01:39.543596151.log` here:

```
219 788000000 scoring_started
494 304000000 new_artifact_reported
494 304000000 found_artifact backpack_1
494 304000000 calculated_dist[2.9063] for artifact[backpack_1] reported_pos[12.1853 -7.42803 0.359794]
494 304000000 modified_score 1
494 304000000 new_total_score 1
...
```

I’m not seeing the updated score on the leader board.  Should this happen automatically?

Thanks!
